data.comment: Erik Lambrechts starts the match. Eupen with the kick-off in Eupen.
Goal! Brugge have got their heads in front thanks to a Youssouph Badji strike.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Brugge kick-off.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 0-2 through Krepin Diatta.
In the minute 65, Julien Ngoy is on a sub for Carlos Embalo for Eupen.
Brugge take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Krepin Diatta.
Great finish from Ruud Vormer to give Brugge a 0-4 lead.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Knowledge Musona with Marciano Aziz.
Brugge make their first substitution with Michael Krmencik replacing Youssouph Badji.
Charles De Ketelaere is replacing Siebe Schrijvers for the away team.
In the minute 87, Brugge make their third substitution with David Okereke replacing Krepin Diatta.
The match is over. Final score 0-4.
The home team have replaced Konan N'Dri with Emmanuel Sowah. This is the third substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
